problem.name: Problem Definition & Market Pain
problem.description: Does the pitch identify a critical, underserved problem with quantifiable impact?

solution.name: Solution & Value Proposition
solution.description: Does the solution offer a transformative improvement with clear, measurable benefits?

market.name: Market Strategy & Sizing
market.description: Is the market analysis credible, with a logical strategy to capture a significant share?

product_tech.name: Technology & Product Excellence
product_tech.description: Does the technology create a genuine competitive advantage with demonstrable results?

go_to_market.name: Go-to-Market & Customer Acquisition
go_to_market.description: Is there a validated, scalable, and capital-efficient path to acquiring customers?

team.name: Team & Founder-Market Fit
team.description: Does the team have the unique domain expertise, skills, and resilience to win?

traction.name: Traction & Momentum
traction.description: Is there compelling evidence of product-market fit and accelerating growth?

competition.name: Competitive Landscape & Positioning
competition.description: Do they show a deep understanding of the competitive landscape and a winning strategy?

defensibility.name: Defensibility & Scalability
defensibility.description: Does the business model create compounding advantages and increasing returns to scale?

financials.name: Financials & Capital Strategy
financials.description: Is there a credible, milestone-driven path to sustainable unit economics and profitability?
